name: The Three Shires Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely inn. Far out enough for the peace but close enough to Ambleside for convenience. Bar food was delicious and reasonably priced. Good walks for everyone - I am 6 months pregnant and was able to do good long low level walks to Great Langdale and Grasmere. If you want the higher peaks plenty to choose from and many more within driving distance. I would stay here again
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: We stayed at the Three Shires Inn during our Cumbria Way hike and were more than pleased with our stay here.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival, I was happy to see the outside tables fully occupied by fellow walkers and the bar inside doing a roaring trade. This is the sort of place people hope to reach after a long hard walk and we felt lucky to be staying here.
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay

aka: The Three Shires Hotel Little Langdale
